## Introduction {data-background=#FFFFCC}
<font size="5"><span style="color:midnightblue">**Problem**</span></font>  
<font size="3"><span style="color:cornflowerblue">People nowadays face a hectic life until they ignore their daily diets. This causes obesity becomes the most common disease occurs among Malaysians.</span></font>  
</br>
<font size="5"><span style="color:midnightblue">**Questions**</span></font>   
<font size="3"><span style="color:cornflowerblue">- How to find out your recommended calories requirement for the day?  
- How to find out the amount of calories and nutrients in the foods you eat?
</span></font>  
</br>
<font size="5"><span style="color:midnightblue">**Skateholders**</span></font>  
<font size="3"><span style="color:cornflowerblue">- Ministry of Health  
- Nutritionist  
- Public who emphasize their diets</span></font>  
</br>
<font size="3"><span style="color:midnightblue">*ShinyApp: *</span></font>  
<font size="3"><span style="color:midnightblue">*GitHub: *https://github.com/wanyinggg/NutritionCalculator</span></font>  

## Description of dataset {data-background=#FFFFCC}

<font size="3"><span style="color:midnightblue">We found and retrieve the dataset from kaggle. We modified the dataset such as removing the unit of each value to make the attributes numeric and deleting some unused columns. The modified dataset contains 8790 rows and 24 columns, showing the nutrition values such as calories, fat, and vitamins for each type of food. All the attributes are numeric except for the food name.</span></font>
